definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: A classic hat for Jeepers. It's 100% Cotton Twill.
sentences.chinese: 很經典的一款運動帽，100%純棉平紋織物。

sentences.english: The style may be simple or elaborate and the material could be muslin or satin.
sentences.chinese: 其風格或簡樸或繁雜，其用料可以是平紋細布或緞子。

sentences.english: Again later on, laura knits dress tabby shirt style dress.
sentences.chinese: 再晚些時候，勞拉將穿着平紋皺襯衣式連衣裙。

sentences.english: And we can provide fabrics of twill, plain cloth, satin etc.
sentences.chinese: 有斜紋，平紋，緞紋等多種規格。

sentences.english: Strain the mixture through a double thickness of muslin or cheesecloth.
sentences.chinese: 用雙層平紋細布或乾酪包布過濾混合料。

sentences.english: Every culture has its own way or embellishing this plain cloth.
sentences.chinese: 不同文化都有自己獨特的方法裝飾平紋布。

sentences.english: I've got some muslin here; will it DO?
sentences.chinese: 我這兒有點平紋細布，你看行嗎？

sentences.english: We are specialising in silver tabby's, occasionally other colors.
sentences.chinese: 我們是專門從事銀平紋的，偶爾也有其他顏色。
